page.title: 20OUR DOMESDAY PROJECT 1985
page.content: {1}THE P7's OF CLOUGHCOR SCHOOL ARE TRYING TO MAKE A BRAND NEW BOOK THE DOMESDAY PROJECT IT IS CALLED SO AROUND THE AREA WE TOOK A LOOK. {2}ALTHOUGH IT SEEMS A BIT UNUSUAL TO SEE CHILDREN OUT OF CLASS WE ENJOY SEEING WHAT'S HISTORICAL AND LOVE TO WALK AROUND THE GRASS {3}IF THE SUN IS SHINING IT'S GREAT CRACK TO GO OUT BUT IF IT'S RAINING WE HAVE TO WRITE WHAT IT'S ALL ABOUT {4}WE LIKE EXPLORING CHURCHYARDS AND SEEING HOW THE RIVERS FLOW WE WALK ALONG THE OLD CANAL AND WATCH THE GRASS AND BARLEY GROW. {5}SO WHEN WE LEAVE CLOUGHCOR WE ALWAYS WILL REMEMBER THE TIMES WE WENT EXPLORING FOR OUR DOMESDAY ENDEAVOUR.
